00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00038 
00039 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00040 
00041 #define LNET_MINOR 240
00042 
00043 static inline size_t libcfs_ioctl_packlen(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data)
00044 {
00045         size_t len = sizeof(*data);
00046 
00047         len += (data->ioc_inllen1 + 7) & ~7;
00048         len += (data->ioc_inllen2 + 7) & ~7;
00049         return len;
00050 }
00051 
00052 static bool libcfs_ioctl_is_invalid(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data)
00053 {
00054         if (data->ioc_hdr.ioc_len > BIT(30))
00055                 return true;
00056 
00057         if (data->ioc_inllen1 > BIT(30))
00058                 return true;
00059 
00060         if (data->ioc_inllen2 > BIT(30))
00061                 return true;
00062 
00063         if (data->ioc_inlbuf1 && !data->ioc_inllen1)
00064                 return true;
00065 
00066         if (data->ioc_inlbuf2 && !data->ioc_inllen2)
00067                 return true;
00068 
00069         if (data->ioc_pbuf1 && !data->ioc_plen1)
00070                 return true;
00071 
00072         if (data->ioc_pbuf2 && !data->ioc_plen2)
00073                 return true;
00074 
00075         if (data->ioc_plen1 && !data->ioc_pbuf1)
00076                 return true;
00077 
00078         if (data->ioc_plen2 && !data->ioc_pbuf2)
00079                 return true;
00080 
00081         if (libcfs_ioctl_packlen(data) != data->ioc_hdr.ioc_len)
00082                 return true;
00083 
00084         if (data->ioc_inllen1 &&
00085             data->ioc_bulk[((data->ioc_inllen1 + 7) & ~7) +
00086                              data->ioc_inllen2 - 1] != '\0')
00087                 return true;
00088 
00089         return false;
00090 }
00091 
00092 int libcfs_ioctl_data_adjust(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data)
00093 {
00094         ENTRY;
00095 
00096         if (libcfs_ioctl_is_invalid(data)) {
00097                 CERROR("libcfs ioctl: parameter not correctly formatted\n");
00098                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00099         }
00100 
00101         if (data->ioc_inllen1 != 0)
00102                 data->ioc_inlbuf1 = &data->ioc_bulk[0];
00103 
00104         if (data->ioc_inllen2 != 0)
00105                 data->ioc_inlbuf2 = &data->ioc_bulk[0] +
00106                                     cfs_size_round(data->ioc_inllen1);
00107 
00108         RETURN(0);
00109 }
00110 
00111 int libcfs_ioctl_getdata(struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr **hdr_pp,
00112                          struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr __user *uhdr)
00113 {
00114         struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr   hdr;
00115         int err = 0;
00116         ENTRY;
00117 
00118         if (copy_from_user(&hdr, uhdr, sizeof(hdr)))
00119                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
00120 
00121         if (hdr.ioc_version != LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION &&
00122             hdr.ioc_version != LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION2) {
00123                 CERROR("libcfs ioctl: version mismatch expected %#x, got %#x\n",
00124                        LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION, hdr.ioc_version);
00125                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00126         }
00127 
00128         if (hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr)) {
00129                 CERROR("libcfs ioctl: user buffer too small for ioctl\n");
00130                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00131         }
00132 
00133         if (hdr.ioc_len > LIBCFS_IOC_DATA_MAX) {
00134                 CERROR("libcfs ioctl: user buffer is too large %d/%d\n",
00135                        hdr.ioc_len, LIBCFS_IOC_DATA_MAX);
00136                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00137         }
00138 
00139         LIBCFS_ALLOC(*hdr_pp, hdr.ioc_len);
00140         if (*hdr_pp == NULL)
00141                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00142 
00143         if (copy_from_user(*hdr_pp, uhdr, hdr.ioc_len))
00144                 GOTO(failed, err = -EFAULT);
00145 
00146         RETURN(0);
00147 failed:
00148         LIBCFS_FREE(*hdr_pp, hdr.ioc_len);
00149         RETURN(err);
00150 }
00151 
00152 static long
00153 libcfs_psdev_ioctl(struct file *file, unsigned int cmd, unsigned long arg)
00154 {
00155         if (!capable(CAP_SYS_ADMIN))
00156                 return -EACCES;
00157 
00158         if (_IOC_TYPE(cmd) != IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE ||
00159             _IOC_NR(cmd) < IOC_LIBCFS_MIN_NR ||
00160             _IOC_NR(cmd) > IOC_LIBCFS_MAX_NR) {
00161                 CDEBUG(D_IOCTL, "invalid ioctl ( type %d, nr %d, size %d )\n",
00162                        _IOC_TYPE(cmd), _IOC_NR(cmd), _IOC_SIZE(cmd));
00163                 return -EINVAL;
00164         }
00165 
00166         return libcfs_ioctl(cmd, (void __user *)arg);
00167 }
00168 
00169 static struct file_operations libcfs_fops = {
00170         .owner          = THIS_MODULE,
00171         .unlocked_ioctl = libcfs_psdev_ioctl,
00172 };
00173 
00174 struct miscdevice libcfs_dev = {
00175         LNET_MINOR,
00176         "lnet",
00177         &libcfs_fops
00178 };
